description: Course Corrections for Threshold Compass - small steers, not life advice

criteria: Imperative voice ('Do this' not 'Try doing this')

corrections.title: Extended exhale
corrections.instruction: Breathe in for 4 counts. Out for 8. Repeat 5 times.

corrections.title: Box breathing
corrections.instruction: Inhale 4 counts. Hold 4. Exhale 4. Hold 4. Repeat 4 cycles.

corrections.title: Physiological sigh
corrections.instruction: Double inhale through nose (full, then top off). Long exhale through mouth. Once.

corrections.title: Belly breathing
corrections.instruction: Hand on belly. Breathe into your hand for 60 seconds. Feel it rise and fall.

corrections.title: Breath count
corrections.instruction: Count exhales from 1 to 10. If you lose count, start over. No judgment.

corrections.title: Micro walk
corrections.instruction: Walk to the nearest window. Look out for 60 seconds. Return.

corrections.title: Stand and stretch
corrections.instruction: Stand. Reach arms overhead. Hold 10 seconds. Release. Repeat 3x.

corrections.title: Shoulder rolls
corrections.instruction: Roll shoulders backward 10 times. Forward 10 times. Slow and deliberate.

corrections.title: Walk outside
corrections.instruction: Step outside for 3 minutes. No destination. No phone.

corrections.title: Shake it out
corrections.instruction: Stand. Shake hands vigorously for 30 seconds. Then arms. Then whole body.

corrections.title: Neck release
corrections.instruction: Drop chin to chest. Roll head slowly to right ear. Then left. 5 cycles.

corrections.title: Silent walk
corrections.instruction: Walk to the furthest point in your space. Return. No sound. Notice your feet.

corrections.title: Five squats
corrections.instruction: Five slow squats. All the way down. All the way up. Feel your legs.

corrections.title: Feet on floor
corrections.instruction: Both feet flat. Press down. Feel all four corners of each foot. Hold 30 seconds.

corrections.title: Cold water hands
corrections.instruction: Run cold water over hands for 30 seconds. Focus on the temperature.

corrections.title: 5-4-3-2-1 senses
corrections.instruction: Name 5 things you see. 4 you hear. 3 you feel. 2 you smell. 1 you taste.

corrections.title: Hold something textured
corrections.instruction: Find an interesting texture. Explore it with fingertips for 60 seconds.

corrections.title: Name where you are
corrections.instruction: Say out loud: your name, where you are, the date, what you're doing.

corrections.title: Count backward
corrections.instruction: Count backward from 100 by 7s. 100, 93, 86... Engages prefrontal cortex.

corrections.title: Self-hug
corrections.instruction: Cross arms over chest, hands on shoulders. Squeeze firmly. Hold 30 seconds.

corrections.title: Eat something slowly
corrections.instruction: One bite of anything. Chew 20 times. Notice texture, temperature, taste.

corrections.title: Ice cube grip
corrections.instruction: Hold an ice cube until it melts. Focus only on the sensation.

corrections.title: Smell something familiar
corrections.instruction: Find something with a familiar scent. Coffee, citrus, soap. Breathe it in deeply.

corrections.title: Ambient sound
corrections.instruction: Put on headphones. Rain, brown noise, nature sounds. Let it wash over you for 5 minutes.

corrections.title: Remove one input
corrections.instruction: Turn off one source of stimulation. Music, notifications, TV. Remove one input.

corrections.title: Light a candle
corrections.instruction: Light a candle. Watch the flame for 60 seconds. Nothing else.

corrections.title: Open a window
corrections.instruction: Open a window. Notice the first sound you hear from outside.

corrections.title: Phone in another room
corrections.instruction: Put your phone in another room. Set a timer for 10 minutes. Be unreachable.

corrections.title: Clear one surface
corrections.instruction: Pick one surface. Clear everything off it. Put things where they belong.

corrections.title: Change rooms
corrections.instruction: Move to a different room. Spend 5 minutes there. Notice the difference.

corrections.title: Dim the lights
corrections.instruction: Turn off overhead lights. Use only side lighting or candles for the next hour.

corrections.title: One sentence
corrections.instruction: Write one sentence about what's present right now. Don't edit it.

corrections.title: Listen for furthest sound
corrections.instruction: Close your eyes. What's the furthest sound you can hear? Stay with it for 60 seconds.

corrections.title: Single-task
corrections.instruction: Choose one task. Do only that for the next 10 minutes. No tabs. No phone. One thing.

corrections.title: Notice three colors
corrections.instruction: Name three colors you can see right now. Where are they? Stay with each for 10 seconds.

corrections.title: Intention reset
corrections.instruction: Recall your intention for today. Say it out loud. Ask: am I moving toward it?

corrections.title: Body scan express
corrections.instruction: Head to feet in 60 seconds. Where are you holding tension? Just notice.

corrections.title: Name your state
corrections.instruction: What emotion is present? Name it. Say: 'I'm feeling [emotion]. That's what's here.'

corrections.title: Three things present
corrections.instruction: Name three things you're grateful for right now. Be specific. No repeats from yesterday.

corrections.title: Text someone
corrections.instruction: Text one person. Just to say hi. No ask. No agenda. Send it now.

corrections.title: Voice note
corrections.instruction: Record a 30-second voice note to a friend. Don't send it. Just feel the connection.

corrections.title: Eye contact
corrections.instruction: Next person you see: make eye contact. Hold it for 3 seconds. Notice what arises.

corrections.title: Call someone
corrections.instruction: Call one person. If they don't answer, leave a message. 2 minutes max.

corrections.title: Dance for 60 seconds
corrections.instruction: Play one song. Move however your body wants. Nobody's watching.

corrections.title: Bare feet on ground
corrections.instruction: Take off your shoes. Stand on grass, dirt, or floor. 2 minutes. Feel the earth.

corrections.title: What wants to move?
corrections.instruction: Ask your body: what wants to move right now? Do that movement for 30 seconds.

corrections.title: Face a window
corrections.instruction: Position yourself facing natural light for the next 30 minutes.

corrections.title: Humming exhale
corrections.instruction: Breathe in normally. Exhale while humming. Feel the vibration in your chest. 5 breaths.

corrections.title: Draw without looking
corrections.instruction: Pick up a pen. Draw something without looking at the paper. 60 seconds.
